## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ab1ecd65142a39c2b15e87389cb30f1777a32edbd2fbcef05c4cc94185e264c7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'customer-identity-mfe-dev' @ 8.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
